HomePage.descriptionPopular: The ones with largest number of filled forms.
HomePage.descriptionLatest: Explore the newest additions to the templates.
HomePage.descriptionAll: Browse the complete collection of templates.

TemplatesViewPage.heading: Preview Form Template
TemplatesViewPage.description: Review the structure and content of this form template before you begin. This preview allows you to see the questions and their types, so you know what to expect when filling it out.
TemplatesViewPage.helpDescription: Here is what you can do on this page.
TemplatesViewPage.helpMessage: If you haven't sign in or sign up you cannot fill out a form.

CommentsSection.heading: Comments
CommentsSection.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!

CommentUpdateDialog.heading: Update Comment
CommentUpdateDialog.description: You can update your comment here.

CreateTemplatePage.helpDescription: You can add several types of questions to your form with the following limits:

QuestionCard.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a short description or any relevant context for this question.

SetTags.title: Select an existing tag
SetTags.createTagDescription: After creating a new tag, it will be available for all the users to use and it will be in the 'Select existing tag' list.

FormSchemaValidation.selectOption: You need to select an option.
FormSchemaValidation.selectAtLeastOneOption: You have to select at least one option.

RegisterSchemaValidation.password: Password must be at least 8 characters
RegisterSchemaValidation.passwordRegex: Password must contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one of the following characters: * . ! @ $ % &

CreateUpdateCommentSchemaValidation.content: Content must be at least 10 characters.

MyTemplatesPage.title: My Templates
MyTemplatesPage.noTemplates: You don't have any templates at the moment.

AnsweredPage.title: Templates with my answers
AnsweredPage.noAnswers: You haven't answered any form yet.

UsersPage.helpDescription: You can manage the users here.
UsersPage.helpMessage: You can only manage the users if you are an admin.
UsersPage.title: Users

AlertModal.title: Are you sure?
AlertModal.changeToNormalMessage: If you change your role to normal user, you will not be able to manage all accounts anymore.
AlertModal.dangerAction: Blocking or deleting your account will log you out.

SubmittedFormsList.noForms: No forms have been submitted yet.

ResponsesContent.noResponsesToQuestion: No responses yet for this question.

DisplayShortAnswers.displayBarQuestion: Do you want to display the answers as a bar chart?

PublishTemplateButton.dialogDescription: This template will be published and available for everyone to see.

errorMessage.title: Title is required.
errorMessage.tag: At least one tag is required.
errorMessage.question: At least one question is required.
errorMessage.questionTitle: Each question must have a title.
errorMessage.questionDescription: Each question must have a description.

PublishTemplateButton.questionSetAnswer: Question {title} must have correct answers set.
PublishTemplateButton.toastError: here are some issues with your template
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoDescription: To create a valid question, please ensure it meets the following criteria:
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoCriteriaBody: Adhere to these rules will allow you to publish your template.
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoCriteria1: Title: Each question must have a clear and descriptive title.
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoCriteria2: Description: A brief description should accompany each question.
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoCriteria3: Options: For multiple choice or checkbox, provide at least two options.
PublishTemplateButton.dialogMoreInfoCriteria4: Correct Answers: If rated, specify correct answers for multiple choice, checkbox, or number types.

DeleteTemplate.title: Just checking to see if you are sure about deleting this template.
DeleteTemplate.description: Deleting this template is irreversible. Once you proceed, all associated data will be lost permanently. Please double-check to ensure this is what you want to do.

TemplatesTagList.instruction: Select a tag name to view the templates associated with it.

Auth.title: {action} to access full features
Auth.description: Use your email or another service to continue.
